data.title: Beta-SGP: Scaled Gradient Projection algorithm using beta divergence
data.name: beta-sgp
data.description: Scaled Gradient Projection (SGP) algorithm with beta divergence

evidence: "This repository contains the code implementation accompanying the paper: **β-SGP: Scaled Gradient Projection with β-divergence for astronomical image restoration**. It is aimed at single-image deconvolution of astronomical images with a known Point Spread Function."
"`sgp.py` contains implementation for SGP with both, β-divergence and KL divergence."
Folder structure and README only describe cloning/using code in this GitHub repository; no mention of PyPI, containers, or other package managers, indicating distribution via the source repository.
